title: Discrete Imprecise Copulas
abstract:
In this paper, we study discrete quasi-copulas associated with imprecise
copulas. We focus on discrete imprecise copulas that are in correspondence with
the Alternating Sign Matrices and provide some construction techniques of dual
pairs. Additionally, we show how to obtain (full-domain) self-dual imprecise
copulas through patchwork techniques. We further investigate the properties of
the constructed dual pairs and prove that they are coherent and avoiding sure
loss.
